mapper.insert: insert into BOOK_INFO (B_NAME, B_CONTENT, B_CRE_DATE,FILE_PATH) values (#{bName}, #{bContent}, #{bCreDate},#{filePath})
mapper.select: select id id, B_NAME bName, B_CONTENT bContent, B_CRE_DATE bCreDate from BOOK_INFO
select id id, B_NAME bName, B_CONTENT bContent, B_CRE_DATE bCreDate from BOOK_INFO where id = #{id}
select id id, B_NAME bName, B_CONTENT bContent, B_CRE_DATE bCreDate,FILE_PATH filePath from BOOK_INFO where B_NAME = #{name}
